name: Couant
description: Summon a droid and generate a shield for **5** seconds. The shield disappears after **5** seconds or after being struck once. When it disappears, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to **100%** of ATK + **50**. If broken within **1** second of being created, the shield will stun enemies for **2** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Shares cooldown with Couant II.

advancement.star1: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker by **35%** for **6** seconds.
advancement.star2: After shield breaks, increase final damage by **20%** for **10** seconds.
advancement.star3: After shield breaks, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.
advancement.star4: Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
advancement.star5: If the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6** × damage taken back at the attacker.

advancement.star1: <abbr title='China Exclusive'></abbr> When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.
advancement.star2: <abbr title='China Exclusive'></abbr> After shield breaks, increase final damage equal to the percentage of HP lost with a minimum of **30%**, for **10** seconds.
